about_the_game:
This game is a role-playing adventure featuring the protagonist "Kim Joongbung," an ordinary unemployed person.

Hearing a rumor that collecting classic games can lead to a great job at a game company, "Kim Joongbung" embarks on a journey to gather classic games.

This is a game about "Kim Joong-boong," a lifelong unemployed man, struggling to live a better life.

Talk to people in the village to gather information for collecting items.
Defeat monsters or collect items to earn monetary rewards.

During the journey, you will encounter various powerful monsters that you must fight and defeat.
Overcome unbeatable monsters by leveling up and gaining strength.

You won't be able to defeat monsters at Level 1.
Converse with villagers and open all treasure chests to purchase armor.

Gather all the items required by the game to achieve your goal.

Press the Page Up key during the game to view the current mission.

Press Page Down to make it disappear.

Controls

  • Movement: Arrow keys

  • Dash: Left Shift key

  • View Mission: Page Up, Page Down

  • View Options: ESC key

name: 디시인사이드 중붕이의 모험(Joongboongi's Adventure)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WINDOWS10
  • Processor: INTEL PENTIUM GOLD
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated motherboard graphics
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WINDOWS10
  • Processor: INTEL I3 8100
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GEFORCE GTX750

kgrb.descriptors: 본 게임은 12세 이상 이용가 게임 입니다.

short_description: The game genre is a modern role-playing game. You can move around the village using the arrow keys, talk to people, and open treasure chests. You can experience the life of a young person that could happen in reality.
